data.title: Melissa Fumero Movies and Shows
data.meta_description: Learn about Melissa Fumero on Apple TV. Browse shows and movies that feature Melissa Fumero including Bar Fight!, I Hope They Serve Beer In Hell, and â¦
data.text:
Red Letter

Romantic sparks begin to fly when Patrick Jane and supposed psychic Kristina Frye (guest star Leslie Hope) cross paths again during the CBI investigation into the murder of a charismatic head of a non-profit organization that fights human trafficking.

A Little Slice of Hell

The remaining chefs meet at DeSano Pizzeria and learn about their next challenge, for which they will be given 30 minutes to create a pizza inspired by their assigned country. Marino, the owner of the pizzeria and HELLâS KITCHENâS MaÃ®tre Dâ, joins Chef Ramsay and special guest judge Steve Samson, to determine the winning team. Later during dinner service, actress Melissa Fumero and Victoriaâs Secret model Devon Windsor join as special guests, and while both teams struggle, one just canât keep up.

The Real McCoy

The CSIs investigate a 1920s-inspired speakeasy when one of its owners is murdered and $10,000 goes missing. Meanwhile, Adam spends his day off in an unexpected way. (TV-14 L, V)
